title: Implement OAuth 2.0 authentication flow
content: Implement OAuth 2.0 with support for Google, GitHub, and email/password providers using Better Auth library.

title: Design and implement database schema
content: Create Drizzle ORM schema for users, boards, cards, and relationships. Include migration scripts.

title: Design hero section for landing page
content: Create modern, responsive hero section with animated gradient background and compelling CTA.

title: Write comprehensive API documentation
content: Document all REST API endpoints with OpenAPI/Swagger spec. Include examples and authentication flow.

title: Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
content: Configure automated testing, linting, building, and deployment to staging/production environments.

title: Integrate Stripe payment processing
content: Implement subscription billing with Stripe. Support multiple tiers and payment methods.

title: Configure Sentry error tracking
content: Set up Sentry for both frontend and backend error monitoring with source maps.

title: Build real-time WebSocket synchronization
content: Implement WebSocket server for real-time board updates. Handle reconnection and conflict resolution.

title: Write E2E tests with Playwright
content: Create comprehensive E2E test suite covering critical user journeys and edge cases.

title: Optimize for mobile responsive design
content: Ensure all views work seamlessly on mobile devices. Test on iOS and Android.

title: POST /api/users - Create user account
content: Endpoint for user registration with email verification.

title: GET /api/boards - List all boards
content: Retrieve paginated list of boards with filtering and sorting.

title: PUT /api/cards/:id - Update card
content: Update card properties, content, and position with optimistic locking.

title: POST /api/webhooks - Register webhook
content: Allow third-party integrations to subscribe to board events.

title: GET /api/search - Full-text search
content: Search across boards, cards, and comments with relevance ranking.

title: Button Component with variants
content: Primary, secondary, ghost, and danger button variants with size options.

title: Modal Dialog Component
content: Accessible modal with focus trap, ESC key handling, and backdrop click to close.

title: Kanban Board Layout
content: Drag-and-drop kanban board with virtual scrolling for performance.

title: Dropdown Select Component
content: Single and multi-select dropdown with search and keyboard navigation.

title: Toast Notification System
content: Non-blocking notifications with success, error, warning, and info variants.

title: Complete WebSocket real-time sync
content: Finish WebSocket implementation with reconnection handling.

title: Add card dependency visualization
content: Show visual connections between dependent cards.

title: Optimize board rendering performance
content: Implement virtualization for large boards with 1000+ cards.

title: Create Docker compose setup
content: One-command local development environment with all services.

title: Run security audit and fix vulnerabilities
content: OWASP top 10 security review and dependency audit.
